name: ite-camp
body:
## Welcome!
This is a webpage for attendees of UVa's Introduction to Engineering (ITE) camp.  I'm leading the design project and competition; this webpage will give links, tutorials, downloads, etc, relevant to this portion of the camp.

### Thursday, June 25
**Presentation Handout:** [click here](https://github.com/apnorton/ite-camp/raw/master/Thursday/ThursdayHandout.pdf).

### Wednesday, June 24

I didn't make any handouts for this day, but am making an entry so people don't get confused.

### Tuesday, June 23

**Programming Handout:** [click here](https://github.com/apnorton/ite-camp/raw/master/Tuesday/TuesdayHandout.pdf).  
**Light Sensor Calibration:** (Optional) [Do this](https://github.com/apnorton/ite-camp/raw/master/Tuesday/Light-Calibration.pdf) if you've worked with robots before.  I made this years ago, so please ignore the colors. :)

### Monday, June 22

**Building Instructions:** [click here](http://www.education.rec.ri.cmu.edu/content/lego/building/build_shows/rem.pdf).  
**Programming Handout:** [click here](https://github.com/apnorton/ite-camp/raw/master/Monday/MondayHandout.pdf).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
